row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PRV.JOB.RANGEMENT_AD
row.description: Rangement du serveur dans l'Active Directory

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_CONNECTION_DETAILS
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
!DECRYPT PASSWORD ! : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH ! : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_VSP_PASSWORD#" ! : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
!------------------------------------ Powershell script for the action -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! $Computer = '&VM_NAME_NEW#' ! $NewOU = '&DEST_AD#' write-host move &VM_NAME_NEW# to &DEST_AD# !Get-ADComputer $Computer | Move-ADObject -TargetPath "$NewOU" write-host "Get-ADComputer -filter {name -eq &VM_NAME_NEW#} -SearchBase &SearchBase# -server &adserver# |Move-ADObject -TargetPath &DEST_AD#" Get-ADComputer -filter {name -eq "&VM_NAME_NEW#"} -SearchBase "&SearchBase#" -server "&adserver#" |Move-ADObject -TargetPath "&DEST_AD#"
write-host ADD-ADGroupMember "&GROUPE_SECU#" -members "&VM_NAME_NEW#" write-host "Get-ADComputer -filter {name -eq &VM_NAME_NEW#} -SearchBase &SearchBase# -server &adserver# |ADD-ADPrincipalGroupMembership -MemberOf &GROUPE_SECU#" Get-ADComputer -filter {name -eq "&VM_NAME_NEW#"} -SearchBase "&SearchBase#" -server "&adserver#" |ADD-ADPrincipalGroupMembership -MemberOf "&GROUPE_SECU#"
!-----------------------------------Error Handling------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** MOVE AD OBJECT EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "********MOVE AD OBJECT ACTION FAILED ********"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_ERRORSTATUS

row.pre_process:
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.START_STOP_JOB_ACCORDING_TO_AGENT_OS :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.PREP_CONNECTION_CMDLETS
:if &SRV_TYPE# = "FIC" : set &DEST_AD#="OU=AutomatedVMs,OU=DCP,DC=d21,DC=tes,DC=local" : SET &SearchBase#="DC=D21,DC=tes,DC=local" : set &adserver#="d21.tes.local" : else : set &DEST_AD#="OU=AutomatedVMs,OU=DCP,DC=d20,DC=tes,DC=local" : SET &SearchBase#="DC=D20,DC=tes,DC=local" : set &adserver#="d20.tes.local" :endif
